attributes.action: Remove the cap on Injured servicemen's compensation
attributes.additional_details:
Awarding an amount of compensation that reflects the injuries sustained and then making sure that the government rules mean there is a cap on the actual amount received is just plain lying.

The Government must make sure our injured service men and women actually receive the compensation they are awarded for their injuries/disabilities and make sure that the rest of their lives are lived out in comfort with appropriate care.
